units.settler.cost.description: Settler production cost (key for expansion balance)

win_rate_balance.description: How close to 50/50 win rate (1.0 = perfect balance)

decision_diversity.description: Variety in viable strategies (measured by build order entropy)

game_length_score.description: Score based on game length being in ideal range (30-100 turns)
